name: Wacky Herbalist
description:
Wacky Herbalist

Welcome in the enchanted forest! Dangerous slimes roam this place. However, the forest is a bounty full of magical herbs. These herbs can be used to brew potions that can buff or debuff. Due to the enchanted forest the herbs keep changing their properties! Each time a level is generated the sprites and effects of herbs change. Find out with trial and error which potions you should throw to a slime and which you should drink yourself!

Controls
  • WASD - Move around
  • E - Make potion
  • Q - Dump herb
  • LMB - Throw potion
  • RMB - Drink potion
  • 1-6/Scroll - Select herb in inventory
  • R - Generate new level

Try to kill as many slimes as possible!

Effects

There are 6 possible effects:

 - Regenerates health over time

  - Deals damage over time

 - Increase walking speed

 -  Decrease walking speed

 - Increase slime damage

 - Decrease slime damage
